item.title: Vectorize All the Things: Multiply-Add
item.description: The rise of Machine Learning is bringing the fashion for numerical tricks and hardware acceleration back. And now that I’ve completed my bacterial DNA counting adventures at ETHZ, it’s time to reboot this blog. As someone who believes in mechanical sympathy I’d like to share some of the experiments in vectorizing simple-yet-fundamental operations. And if you have some insights how to beat the benchmarks below, I’d gladly accept them and extend the list.
